subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Bay, who was signed through the end of the 2013 season and had a $3 million buyout clause for 2014, had three hugely disappointing years with the Mets.
snippet: Jason Bay, who was signed through the end of the 2013 season and had a $3 million buyout clause for 2014, had three hugely disappointing years with the Mets.
